data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Valle d'Aosta prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Valle d‘Aosta, Italy
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,863 believers in Valle d'Aosta to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Valle d‘Aosta, Italy into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Valle d‘Aosta, Italy.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the South Asian, general people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, encourage the church of Valle d‘Aosta, Italy that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Valle d‘Aosta, Italy to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,863 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

location.name: Valle d'Aosta
location.people_groups_list: Pomak, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Kurd, Kurmanji, Sinhalese, Japanese
